footer.about: This website is made for finding and exploring the cottage, and it's nearby surroundings.
footer.book: You can book the cottage via

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: Contact us if you have questions before or during your stay and we will help you as soon as possible!
contact.name: Name

about.title: About the cottage
about.text: Here you live comfortably with an open floor plan between kitchen and living room, three different bedrooms, two toilets, a shower and a large terrace with nice outdoor furniture.

find.title: Find it
find.text: With a short ferry ride from Öregrund you will reach Gräsö and Nyhem 15

explore.title: Experience Gräsö
explore.text: On Gräsö you can explore a lot by bike and on foot, walk in beautiful nature reserves such as Gräsö farm where the cows graze along the shoreline. Take a boat trip to nearby archipelago islands, rent a canoe or jet ski, explore all the fantastic bathing spots and find just your favorite places.

aboutpage.intro: Read about the cottage and it's history.

description.intro: Here you live comfortably with an open floorplan between the kitchen and the livingroom, three bedrooms, two toilets, a shower and a big terrace with nice furnitures. The house is 145㎡ big.

findpage.intro: Find the cottage and plan your trip.

public.nyhem152: It's about a 3,5km walk which should take no more than 40 minutes.

car.oregrund2: Search trip from any bus stop:

mooring.text: Go to the mooring. There is a private mooring to borrow during your stay.

boat.nyhem15: Walk from the mooring to Nyhem 15. It takes about 10 minutes.

explorepage.intro: Read our tips for the best experience of the beautiful island.
